body_html:
I've had a quick look at Eigen to see whether these two are already supported as functors.
log1p is there, but expm1 is missing.
That means a good start for expm1 would be to add it to Eigen.
I think some extra work in Eigen is also needed to get log1p to work with GPU ops (e.g. adding it to Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/MathFunctions.h)

Edit: I've opened a PR to Eigen with the necessary changes for log1p here: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/217/add-log1p-support-for-cuda-and-half-floats/diff. I'll update this issue once the changes end up in TensorFlow.

body:
I've had a quick look at Eigen to see whether these two are already supported as functors.
`log1p` is there, but `expm1` is missing.
That means a good start for `expm1` would be to add it to Eigen.
I think some extra work in Eigen is also needed to get `log1p` to work with GPU ops (e.g. adding it to `Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/MathFunctions.h`)

**Edit:** I've opened a PR to Eigen with the necessary changes for `log1p` here: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/217/add-log1p-support-for-cuda-and-half-floats/diff. I'll update this issue once the changes end up in TensorFlow.
